fields.label: How To Build the Schedule
fields.message:
1. Create a new schedule post for each festival day
  2. Add Time Blocks as needed: blocks can be assigned to existing Films & Panels, automatically designate a 'Break', or hold custom text
  3. Set the duration - in minutes - for each block
    • • Film blocks will automatically use the film running time as its duration
    • • Text blocks may have a '0' duration - these timestamps can be hidden by adding non-timed in the Style input field
  4. Blocks can be rearranged by dragging on the block number in the left column

fields.label: Schedule Category
fields.name: schedule_category
fields.instructions: Columns appear in Ascending order of publication date. Schedules must be created in order: Thurs - Sun.

fields.label: Copyright Info
fields.name: copyright_info
fields.instructions: Do not add copyright year, it is generated automatically.
